scripts.tauri:dev: node -e "const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); const path = require('path'); const tauriDir = path.join(process.cwd(), 'src-tauri'); const env = { ...process.env, TAURI_DIR: tauriDir, CARGO_TARGET_DIR: path.join(tauriDir, 'target') }; delete env.TAURI_CONFIG; const binName = process.platform === 'win32' ? 'tauri.cmd' : 'tauri'; const tauriPath = path.join(process.cwd(), 'node_modules', '.bin', binName); let result; if (process.platform === 'win32') { const quote = (value) => value.includes(' ') ? `\"${value.replace(/\"/g, '\\\"')}\"` : value; const cmdLine = [quote(tauriPath), 'dev'].join(' '); result = spawnSync('cmd.exe', ['/d', '/s', '/c', cmdLine], { stdio: 'inherit', env }); } else { result = spawnSync(tauriPath, ['dev'], { stdio: 'inherit', env }); } process.exit(result.status ?? 0);"
scripts.tauri:build: node -e "const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); const path = require('path'); const tauriDir = path.join(process.cwd(), 'src-tauri'); const env = { ...process.env, TAURI_DIR: tauriDir, CARGO_TARGET_DIR: path.join(tauriDir, 'target') }; delete env.TAURI_CONFIG; const binName = process.platform === 'win32' ? 'tauri.cmd' : 'tauri'; const tauriPath = path.join(process.cwd(), 'node_modules', '.bin', binName); let result; if (process.platform === 'win32') { const quote = (value) => value.includes(' ') ? `\"${value.replace(/\"/g, '\\\"')}\"` : value; const cmdLine = [quote(tauriPath), 'build'].join(' '); result = spawnSync('cmd.exe', ['/d', '/s', '/c', cmdLine], { stdio: 'inherit', env }); } else { result = spawnSync(tauriPath, ['build'], { stdio: 'inherit', env }); } process.exit(result.status ?? 0);"
